channel.title: Help me plox (A quick fix will Rep)
channel.description: Hey guys today I managed to make all my Godwars bosses use there Attacking anims they already had standing and walking done but then I think where would I add blocking? i have to set the anim to each Godwars boss but i don't know where to edit it please help.
